snippet.title: Frankenstein: Master of Death - Trailer
snippet.description:
http://store.steampowered.com/app/347430/

The border between life and death is fragile. Restore the course of nature, resolving puzzles and searching for clues in "Frankenstein: Master of Death". 

- A new look at the classic story 
- Lots of clues to search and mysteries to solve 
- Fantastic puzzles to solve 
- Stunning 2k HD graphics 
- Unlockable achievements 

The game is in a final developing stage now. Coming soon in early 2015!
